title: Organizational Development Practice Competency Enhancement: Intensive Instructional Design for Information Literacy Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners will explain criteria for identifying credible information sources with 90% accuracy.
Learners will efficiently search, filter, and apply relevant information to propose utilization strategies in given work scenarios.
Learners will analyze potential information biases and develop strategies for integrating information to support objective decision-making.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
